interface.placeholder: please write a descriptive message here.

general.lockMessage: [{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"Sorry but your submission would be visible only after completing the payment."}]}]
general.successMessage: [{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"Your payment was successful. Your Order ID is "},{"character":"::invoiceId::","type":"mentions","children":[{"text":""}]},{"text":". Kindly take a note of it for future references."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"You can find the full order details below."}]}]
general.errorMessage: [{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"Your payment could not be processed at this moment. Please try again. If any amount was deducted, it will be refunded automatically."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"For future communications, kindly note the Invoice Id "},{"character":"::invoiceId::","type":"mentions","children":[{"text":""}]},{"text":". You can also retry the payment using the form below."}]}]
general.cancelMessage: Your payment was cancelled before it could be completed. You can retry the payment using the form below.

offline.label: Bank Transfer
offline.instruction: [{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"Please note down our bank details and submit the form. Once transferred, contact us back with the transaction ID and submission ID which you will find after the order."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"Enter the bank details here."}]}]
offline.status: [{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"Awaiting confirmation of your payment. If you have completed the payment, please get in touch with us with Order Id "},{"character":"::invoiceId::","type":"mentions","children":[{"text":""}]},{"text":"."}]}]

submissionPermission.totalLimitMsg: Sorry the form can not be submitted any more.
submissionPermission.emailLimitMsg: Submission limit from your email has been exceeded.
submissionPermission.ipLimitMsg: Submission limit from this IP address has been exceeded.
submissionPermission.userLimitMsg: [{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"Your submission limit has been exceeded. You can check "},{"url":"%PORTAL_LINK%","title":"","target":"","rel":"","type":"link","children":[{"text":"your portal page"}]},{"text":" to access previous submissions."}]}]
submissionPermission.cookieLimitMsg: You have exceeded your limit to submit this form.
submissionPermission.loginLimitLoggedInMsg: [{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"Sorry you can not submit this form. You need to be "},{"url":"%LOGIN_LINK%","title":"","target":"","rel":"","type":"link","children":[{"text":"logged in"}]},{"text":" to be able to submit this form."}]}]
submissionPermission.loginLimitLoggedOutMsg: [{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"Sorry you can not submit this form. You need to be "},{"url":"%LOGOUT_LINK%","title":"","target":"","rel":"","type":"link","children":[{"text":"logged out"}]},{"text":" to be able to submit this form."}]}]
submissionPermission.intervalLimitMsg: [{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"Slow down there. You need to wait for atleast "},{"character":"::submissionWaitTime::","type":"mentions","children":[{"text":""}]},{"text":" before submitting again."}]}]
submissionPermission.startsOnMsg: [{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"Sorry we are not accepting submissions till "},{"character":"::submissionStartDate::","type":"mentions","children":[{"text":""}]},{"text":"."}]}]
submissionPermission.submittedNotice: [{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"It looks like you have already submitted this form. You can browse it "},{"url":"%LAST_SUBMISSION_LINK%","title":"","target":"","rel":"","type":"link","children":[{"text":"here"}]},{"text":". You can also continue to submit the form again."}]}]

userNotification.subject: [{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"Hey "},{"character":"::fName::","type":"mentions","children":[{"text":""}]},{"text":" we have got your answers"}]}]
userNotification.message: [{"type":"heading-two","children":[{"text":"Hey "},{"character":"::fName::","type":"mentions","children":[{"text":""}]},{"text":","}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"Thank you "},{"character":"::name::","type":"mentions","children":[{"text":""}]},{"text":" for the submission.  We have received your answers, which you can see online by clicking the link below. For your convenience we have also included the submission data we have recorded in this email."}]}]
userNotification.updateMessage: [{"type":"heading-two","children":[{"text":"Hey "},{"character":"::fName::","type":"mentions","children":[{"text":""}]},{"text":","}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"Thank you "},{"character":"::name::","type":"mentions","children":[{"text":""}]},{"text":" for the submission.  We have updated the record according to your changes. You can view it online following the link below. For your convenience we have also included the submission data we have updated in this email."}]}]
userNotification.adminUpdateSubject: [{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"Hey "},{"character":"::fName::","type":"mentions","children":[{"text":""}]},{"text":" an admin has updated your submission"}]}]
userNotification.adminUpdateMessage: [{"type":"heading-two","children":[{"text":"Hey "},{"character":"::fName::","type":"mentions","children":[{"text":""}]},{"text":","}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"Our staff has updated your submission. The following remarks were added."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":""},{"character":"::adminRemarks::","type":"mentions","children":[{"text":""}]},{"text":""}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"You can view it online following the link below. For your convenience we have also included the submission data we have updated in this email."}]}]
userNotification.footer: [{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"You are receiving this email because you have submitted a form."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"\u00a9 WP EForm. This is not a marketing email."}]}]

adminNotification.updateMessage: [{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"An existing submission has been updated. scoreLists.outcomeDescription: The higher the score the better the result.
